docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 8 (U.P.)--The British auxiliary cruiser Carnarvon Castle, hit twenty-two times in a battle with a German sea raider, was being repaired tonight with steel plates reportedly taken from the scuttled German pocket battleship...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 8 (U.P.)--The British auxiliary cruiser Carnarvon Castle, hit twenty-two times in a battle with a German sea raider, was being repaired tonight with steel plates reportedly taken from the scuttled German pocket battleship Admiral Graf Spee.
docs.abstract: ship undergoes repairs; rumored Brit cruiser Enterprise is to engage German raider; casualties listed; illus

headline.main: CARNARVON CASTLE PUTS TO SEA AGAIN; Auxiliary Cruiser, Repaired in Montevideo After Battle, Is Under Sealed Orders NAZI FREIGHTER SCUTTLED London Announces Crew of the Idarwald Sank Her When Overtaken Off Cuba

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 11--Agents of German concerns that failed to make deliveries to South America in October--the time they had set for the end of the war--now are informing their customers that the war will be over by the end of December and...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 11--Agents of German concerns that failed to make deliveries to South America in October--the time they had set for the end of the war--now are informing their customers that the war will be over by the end of December and urging them to place orders for delivery then.
